repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: Account Book for Farmers, Fond du Lac, Wisconsin Records
did.abstract: This collection contains a late 19th century account book for farmers, published in Fond du Lac, Wisconsin.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection is only one volume and does not warrant processing.

bioghist.head: Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Reed and Keyes' Account Book for Farmers' was published by P.B. Haber (Phinelan B. Haber) in Fond du Lac, Wisconsin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The account book was not utilized but contains local advertisements from Fond du Lac and the surrounding area, sample promissary notes, sections for various expenditures.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: There is only one account book. There are no series.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased from dealer Craig W. Ross, likely in the mid- to late 1960s.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this record group is unrestricted.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Account Book for Farmers, Fond du Lac, Wisconsin Records, 1881. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Account Book for Farmers, Fond du Lac, Wisconsin Records).
